Study Title: Efficacy of Capecitabine Metronomic Chemotherapy to Triple-negative Breast Cancer
Brief Summary: The primary objective of this study is to compare disease-free survival (DFS) of patients with triple negative breast cancer randomised to treatment with standard adjuvant chemotherapy alone or to standard adjuvant chemotherapy followed by 1 year of Capecitabine (Xeloda) metronomic therapy.
Primary Outcome Measures: disease-free survival, The final analysis are expected to occur 36 months after the end of recruitment., 36 months
Study Design: Allocation: RANDOMIZED|Intervention Model: PARALLEL|Masking: NONE|Primary Purpose: TREATMENT
Locations: Sun Yat-sen University, Cancer Center, Guangzhou, Guangdong, 510060, China
